name: Unforgiving - A Northern Hymn
description: Unforgiving - A Northern Hymn is a first person horror game heavily inspired by Swedish folklore and the Nordic mythology to create the nightmares that's been haunting Swedish children for many generations.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 32/64-bit Processor: Intel core i3 or equivalent AMD Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX460m DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
